channel.title: Idle accounts
channel.description: why doesn't mopar clean up this website and delete all the accounts that have 0 posts and have to take the quiz?

item.title: Idle accounts
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

Send everyone on a monday afternoon that has 0 posts a message on there account saying they will be delete in 10 days, and if they don’t respond and each day, count down the days, and if they do , ask them why they don’t post, just ban the ones that don’t respond to anything, do this once every 3 months.

Thank you dell451, you are such a little genius, and your sooo sexy, I love you dell!

I wish school was like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Idle accounts
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Simple: This community isn’t anti-leech. If they make accounts then at least that is better then just being a guest. Plus why would he? He has said numerous times that it wouldn’t do anything of use besides saving like <1mb of server space.
